title: 1 GB per month
info: 1GB Internet for 30 days at the price of 110 Afghanis. To activate 1GB and to deactivate send U1GB to 555.

title: 2GB per month
info: 2 GB Internet for 30 days at the price of 220 Afghanis. Send M1 to 555 to activate and UM1 to deactivate.

title: 3.2 GB monthly
info: 3.2GB of Internet for 30 days at the price of 330 Afghanis. To activate M2 and to deactivate send UM2 to 555.

title: 4.5 GB monthly
info: 4.5 GB Internet for 30 days at the price of 440 Afghanis. To activate M3 and to deactivate send UM3 to 555.

title: 6 GB per month
info: 6 GB Internet for 30 days at the price of 540 Afghanis. Send 5 to activate and U5 to 555 to deactivate.

title: 10.5 GB per month
info: 10.5 GB of Internet for 30 days at the price of 540 Afghanis. Send R10 to activate and UR10 to deactivate to 555.

title: 16 GB monthly
info: 16 GB Internet for 30 days at the price of 900 Afghanis. To activate SM9 and to deactivate USM9, send to 555.

title: 20 GB per month
info: 20 GB Internet for 30 days at the price of 999 Afghanis. Send R20 to activate and UR20 to deactivate to 555.

title: 40 GB monthly
info: 40 GB Internet for 30 days at the price of 1999 Afghanis. To activate 40GB and to deactivate send U40GB to 555.
